title: LLE comes in different flavours
description: I haven't worked in the manifold module since last time, yet thanks to Jake VanderPlas there are some cool features I can talk about. First of, the ARPACK backend is finally working and gives factor one speedup over the lobcpg + PyAMG approach. The key is to use ARPACK's shift-invert mode â€¦
